mapper.select: select e.id, username, password, e.name as name, gender, phone, job, salary, image, entry_date, d.name as dept_name, e.create_time, e.update_time from emp e left join dept d on e.dept_id = d.id where gender = #{gender} and e.name like '%#{name}%' and e.create_time between #{begin} and #{end} order by update_time desc
